title: Thin snail meat

properties.name: description
properties.value: Thin snail meat are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking thin snails on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 12 Cooking and granting 70 experience when successful. Players may burn the snail while cooking one, resulting in a burnt snail; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 47 on both ranges and fires. Eating it heals 5 to 7 hitpoints in one bite.

Item ID3369

Thin snail meat are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking thin snails on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 12 Cooking and granting 70 experience when successful. Players may burn the snail while cooking one, resulting in a burnt snail; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 47 on both ranges and fires. Eating it heals 5 to 7 hitpoints in one bite.

Its uncooked counterpart is obtained by killing a snail in Morytania. Cooking one is also a task in the easy set of the Morytania Diary.

{{External|rs}} {{Infobox Item |name = Thin snail meat |image = [[File:Thin snail meat.png]] |release = [[14 October]] [[2004]] |update = Morytania Expansion |members = Yes |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = No |noteable = Yes |edible = Yes |options = Eat |destroy = Drop |examine = A succulently slimy slice of sumptuous snail. |value = 10 |weight = 3.000 |exchange = Yes |id = 3369 }} [[File:Thin snail meat detail.png|left|150px]] '''Thin snail meat''' are a type of [[food]] that can be obtained by cooking [[thin snail]]s on a [[fire]] or [[cooking range]], requiring level 12 [[Cooking]] and granting 70 experience when successful. Players may burn the snail while cooking one, resulting in a [[burnt snail]]; the [[burn rate]] while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 47 on both ranges and fires. Eating it heals 5 to 7 [[hitpoints]] in one bite. Its [[Thin snail|uncooked]] counterpart is obtained by killing a [[snail]] in [[Morytania]]. Cooking one is also a task in the easy set of the [[Morytania Diary]]. ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Cooking |skill1lvl = 12 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 70 |members = Yes |ticks = 1 |ticksnote = Increases to 4 with the use of the Make-X functionality. |facilities = Cooking range |mat1 = Thin snail |output1 = Thin snail meat }} ===Cooking chance=== {{Skilling success chart|label=Thin snail meat cooking chance |label1=Fire or Range|low1=93|high1=444|req1=12|color1=gray|image1=Thin snail meat.png |label2=Lumbridge range|low2=103|high2=464|req2=12|color2=green|image2=Lumbridge Teleport.png |label3=Hosidius +5%|low3=105|high3=456|req3=12|color3=red|image3=Thin snail meat.png |label4=Hosidius +10%|low4=118|high4=469|req4=79|color4=blue|image4=Thin snail meat.png }} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |daterange = 5 July –
